  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:oai.cnice.mec.es:clao_es_20070119_2_0020313</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ISFRRP-MEPSYD</catalog>
            <entry>clao_es_20070119_2_0020313</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="es">Viaje por Grecia</string>
            <string language="en">Journey through Greece</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Reise durch Griechenland</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Voyage par la Grèce</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Viagem através de Greece</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Viaggio attraverso la Grecia</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ταξίδι μέσω της Ελλάδας</string>
          </title>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es">En esta actividad se realiza un recorrido sobre un mapa tridimensional por ciudades de la Grecia continental y Peloponeso.</string>
            <string language="en">This activity takes the students on a three-dimensional journey through the cities of Continental Greece and the Peloponnesus.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">Grecia continental</string>
            <string language="en">Continental Greece</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">Peloponeso</string>
            <string language="en">Peloponnesus</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <value>collection</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Aktivität nimmt die Kursteilnehmer auf 
einer dreidimensionalen Reise durch die Städte von kontinentalem 
Griechenland und von Peloponnesus.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette activité prend les étudiants sur un voyage
tridimensionnel par les villes de la Grèce continentale et du 
Peloponnesus.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta atividade faz exame dos estudantes em uma 
viagem tridimensional através das cidades de Greece continental e do 
Peloponnesus.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa attività prende gli allievi su un viaggio 
tridimensionale attraverso le città della Grecia continentale e del 
Peloponnesus.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η δραστηριότητα παίρνει τους σπουδαστές σε ένα 
τρισδιάστατο ταξίδι μέσω των πόλεων της ηπειρωτικής Ελλάδας και 
του Peloponnesus.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kontinentales Griechenland</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Peloponnesus</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Grèce Continentale</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Peloponnesus</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Greece Continental</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Peloponnesus</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La Grecia Continentale</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Peloponnesus</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ηπειρωτική Ελλάδα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Peloponnesus</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
